name: ai-call-system
description: AI-powered call system with frontend and backend

scripts.build: cd frontend && npm install && npm run build
scripts.dev: npm run check-config && echo 'Start backend first: npm run start-backend' && echo 'Then frontend: npm run start-frontend'
scripts.install-all: cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install
scripts.postinstall: cd frontend && npm install && cd ../backend && npm install

author: AI Call System
